Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD; PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Hepi amulet
Description: Amulet representing the god Hepi, son of Horus, anthropoid with the head of a baboon. He is shown in profile, facing left, dressed in a long tunic and holding a crook in his hands. At the top and bottom are two openings for suspension, one on each side.
